content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Translation of Latin caption: “There is no power on Earth that can be compared to him” (a quote from the Christian Bible).

a) Describe one way the image characterizes monarchical power in the period circa 1600 to 1750.

b) Explain how one specific ruler in the period circa 1600 to 1750 embodied the monarchical ideal expressed in the image.

c) Explain how one political thinker in the period circa 1600 to 1750 challenged the ideals expressed in the image.
